short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser css modifications, ability to modify: background color, background image, font color, custom google fonts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CSS Browser Modifications:

This extension allows you to do a variety of things, such as:
- Modify All Sites Background Color
- Modify All Sites Background Image
- Modify All Sites font color
- Modify All Sites font family, custom google fonts.

This extensions does not:
- Collect any user info

This extension is open source, view code: https://github.com/sell/chrome-extension-example
